Method Detail

getSource

public SoundSource getSource()
returns the current sound source supporting the sound. This is here mostly to support the View, but it can be used if done carefully to manipulate the sound source explcitely. This can return null if the sound is not active.

Returns:

setSource

public void setSource(SoundSource source)
Should be set only by the View

setLive

public void setLive(boolean live)
If making node non-live when it was live deallocates sound resources associated with this sound node, and marks this node as non-enabled by call to setEnable(false).

Overrides:
setLive in class SceneGraphObject
